Title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
About: King Arthur and his Knights of the round table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
About: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency..

Title: Inception
About: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Title: Schindler's List
About: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: The Departed
About: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: Alien
About: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.
